record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 2419 AND H.R. 3221
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 2419 AND H.R. 3221 -- (Senate - September 05, 2007)

[Page: S11084]

speaking.paragraph: I have a matter of business, Mr. President.
There are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for a second time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2419) to provide for the continuation of agricultural programs through fiscal year 2012, and for other purposes.

A bill (H.R. 3221) moving the United States toward greater energy independence and security, developing innovative new technologies, reducing carbon emissions, creating green jobs, protecting consumers, increasing clean renewable energy production, and modernizing our energy infrastructure, and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for the production of renewable energy and energy conservation.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these two bills en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will be placed on the calendar.
